entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy loves rules and is described as refusing to break them for his own son.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned in the context of Percy's refusal to break rules for him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as speaking severely about Percy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned in the context of discussing Percy's ambition and career.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who must really like Snuffles.

entities.name: snuffles
entities.description: Snuffles is described as a pet that lives off rats.

relationships.description: Percy refuses to break rules for his own son, Crouch.
Hermione severely disapproves of Percy's actions.
Ron is concerned about Percy's ambition and career.
Harry must really like Snuffles, as mentioned by Ron.
Percy's actions are disapproved of by Hermione.
Ron comments on Harry's relationship with Snuffles.
